title: Y'all remember Will of the Ancients?
body: Ah. Those were the days. When you could build it on {{champion:8}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:69}}. Sigh, I forgot Ryze used to have spell vamp.

replies.body: Old {{champion:8}} with WOTA ... so fun and interactive gameplay

I remember building Taric with wota, zeke's, fh, and aegis.  The aura bot gem knight.

I miss Wota on Morde though.  20% cdr and spell vamp was perfect for him.

I built it on {{champion:115}} cuz uhhhh I sucked at dodging skillshots. 
*wait I'm low, I'll go ult the huge wave bot lane brb*
To answer your question, no I wasn't lvl 30
when ryze could just press r with spell vamp items then heal his entire health bar by spamming buttons
and wonder where his enemies went xD
remember when ryze had to be disabled in urf since he was the most unkillable thing once he hit 6 with perma ulti and w basically being a perma root
